article_title: Competition Lowered Price of Motorola Annuity
article_text: Bidding for Motorola’s pension obligations was so intense that the telecommunications equipment company will unload $3.1 billion in bonds and other assets without paying a premium. The auction started in July and five insurers bid. On Thursday, Motorola Solutions Inc. said the winner was Prudential Financial Inc., and declined to name the losing suitors.
